name: Gargoyle ring
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
The bearer of this ring will inherit some of the gargoyles' resistive
There is a small amount of gargoyle essence trapped within this ring.
The wearer of this ring becomes resistant to gargoyle-like abilities.
